column4: may I do connect two pc's using only an ethernet wire if I have windows xp at the first one and ubuntu 10.4 at the other one?
what Jordan_U said, and you will also have to set fixed ip-addresses in the same range (for example 192.168.42.1 and 192.168.42.2 with the netmask 255.255.255.0)
and you'll probably not have internet access while you do that
